parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Well, my name is Esperanza Huayama Aguirre,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: from the village of Rodeo Pampa,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: when a committee from Lima arrived,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: they took several of us to the policlinic,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: they gathered more than a hundred women there

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: that day when that committee came,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: it was like being in a prison.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and when some women saw how others were crying with the pain

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: but we were already inside and they wouldn’t let us leave.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and drew blood from my finger for tests

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and then they brought me to do the sterilisation

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: because God didn’t want my baby to die at that moment,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I said to them: ‘I don’t want you to remove my baby,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I’d rather die with my baby,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and after that I don’t remember anything.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I remember around 6 pm with a tremendous pain,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: that they had made us lie down head to feet,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: And I woke up with tremendous pain,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: the IV line had come out of my arm.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and they threw us out and told us we all had to go home.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: And a lady that had also been cut badly

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: was sent to Piura and she had died in Piura.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I was 3 months pregnant when they did it,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: there was a doctor that checked on me,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: very angrily said that those doctors had come

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: but had made a damage by cutting our bellies.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: Some women had ended up really bad,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and he kept checking on me every 3 days,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: thank God my husband he got the money

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: so that I could be a bit better.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: My belly had swollen and I used to sleep like sitting down

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I suffered with my little child like this

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and the doctor was checking on me,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and he told me it was better if I went to Piura

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: because here they wouldn’t be able to…

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I went to say goodbye to my children,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I said goodbye to them to go to Piura

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: They took me to my village, Rodeo Pampa

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I woke up with a tremendous pain and

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and huge gush of blood came out of me,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: because in the countryside there are midwifes

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and they also fix our bellies,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: until they brought me to Huancabamba.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: but the midwife had already helped me give birth.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: They had seen him and pulled him out with the doctor.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: It gets swollen when I make effort,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I can’t go to the country anymore

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: I can still do soft things

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: but I can’t be in the country,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: This is why us peasant women,

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: they did what they wanted to us.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: But now we say that these things

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: that have damaged all the women in this area

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: In Huarmaca everyone is bad, we are all bad.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: and we won’t allow other young women

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: we won’t allow this to happen again.

parameter.name: Text
parameter.value: we are asking for women’s rights.
